Introduction
This topic contains information on determining eligibility for the special allowance under 38 U.S.C. 1312(a), including eligibility determinations made by the
Department of Veterans Affairs (VA)
, and
Social Security Administration (SSA)
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Eligibility Determinations and Claims for the Special Allowance Under 38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
citation: Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B
